text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
One day during break, I happen to see<n>Narita Brian speaking
with another<n>student.

text_block_list.name: Friendly Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
So, like, I have some friends who're<n>fans of yours too, and
we wanna go<n>to karaoke with you sometime—

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: I'm busy. Go ask someone else.

text_block_list.name: Friendly Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Oh...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Seeing that interaction reminds me of<n>when I first met her.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: There's nothing to talk about.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Scram.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Even now, we don't speak much<n>outside of training. Maybe
we'd<n>understand each other better if we<n>could talk a little
more...

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: No need. You're my trainer—nothing<n>more, nothing less.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Conversation over. Let's start<n>training.
choice_data_list: But I want to know more about you.
But I want to know more about you.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: ...What good would that do?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Just think about it. Why get involved<n>in other people's
lives?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
I never expected you to get to know<n>me. You don't need to
understand my<n>motivation.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
All you need to know is that I want to<n>run. Help me do that,
and we're good.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: That's enough for me.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The whole time she's saying this,<n>she's staring off into the
distance.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
I don't want to see anyone's fire go<n>out anymore, much
less extinguish it<n>myself. I'm... sick of it.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Her hunger for racing may not be<n>something that can be
sated in a<n>single lifetime.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
No matter where I go, no matter who I<n>challenge, it's always
the same. I'm<n>left feeling hungrier than before.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She must have been suffering this<n>lonesome burden for a
long time.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: It's not enough. I need more!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Her drive will never be satisfied no<n>matter how many
opponents she<n>faces.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Narita Brian will always have to<n>contend with this unceasing
desire in<n>her heart.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
That's enough. Talking more won't<n>get me anywhere.
Let's drop this<n>pointless discu—

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
choice_data_list: I'm positive it won't be for nothing.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: You really...

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: ...Sigh. Fine.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Don't expect me to like it, though. I'm<n>still going to do what
I want.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Simple as that.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Well, no need to rush... We'll take it<n>slow and build up our
rapport from<n>there.
